column4: hey, i'm trying to dist-upgrade using apt-get, which repos should i have, every time some problems occur
it says i shoud run -i install
-f install says E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)
i had that problem too, want my fix?
note i still have one problem, when i boot, Xorg doesnt start, but i can start it easily by just logging into a virtual terminal and goign "startx"
well its no doubt a pain in the ass, but... i think you can do it, and i mean, why lose all your data if you can just upgrade?
sure, by the way, any time i do something more than once, i think its safe to only do it once lol, that was just me trying everything
no... i didnt unfortunately, hold on
if you sent me any since that, its not working lol
all i did was open up synaptic, scroll down to find a package that was broken (has an ALL red checkbox next to it) click on it and hit remove broken package
